long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension hides game chat by default on online-go.com, and gives you a button to toggle it on and off.

If you've ever had to deal with trash talk, other forms of rudeness, or if you're just not feeling particularly chatty and would rather play a game in peace, this is the extension for you.
